publicationStmt.p: Distributed by Digital Scholarship Services at Lafayette College

lg.l: All Traveller at first incline,
Where-e'er they see the fairest sign;
And if they find the chambers neat,
And like the liquor and the meat,
Will call again, and recommend
The Angel-Inn to ev'ry friend:
What tho' the Painting grows deccay'd,
The house will never lose its trade:
Nay tho the treacherous tapster Thomas
Hangs a new Angel two doors from us,
As fine as Dawbers hands can make it,
In hopes that strangers may mistake it
We think it both a shame and Sin
To qut the true old Angel-Inn.
Now this is Stella's case in fact,
An Angel's face, a little crack'd;
Could Poets, or could Painters fix
How Angels look at thirty-six.
This drew us in at first to find
In such a form an Angel's mind;
And ev'ry Virtue now supplies
The fainting rays of Stella's Eyes.
See at her levee crowding swains,
Whom Stella freely entertains
With humour, Breeding, Wit, and Sense,
And puts them but to small expence;
Their mind so plentifully fills,
And makes such reasonable Bills,
S little gets for what she gives,
We really wonder how she lives!
And had her stock been less, no doubt,
She must have long ago run out.
Then who can think, weÂ·'ll quit the place,
When Doll hangs out a newer face;
Or stop and light at Chloe's head,
With scraps and leavings to be fed?
Then Chloe, still go on to prate
Of Thirty-six, and thirty-eight;
Pursue Your trade of scandal picking
Your hints that Stella is no Chicken;
Your inuendo's, when you tell us
That Stella loves to talk with Fellows;
And let me warn you to believe
A truth for which your soul should grieve;
That should you live to see the day,
When Stella's locks must all be grey,
When Age must print a furrow'd trace
On ev'ry feature of her face;
Tho you, and all your senseless tribe,
Could Art, or time, or Nature bribe
To make you look like Beauty's Queen,
And hold for ever at fifteen;
No Bloom of youth can ever blind
The cracks and wrinkles of your:
All men of sense will pass your door,
And croud to Stella's at Fourscore.734-180F
